divs: sighting details1.i was fishing on opeepeesway lake 2.checking the weather\clouds 3.unknown 4.the object remained stationary. 5.uncertain of what i was seeing 6.looked to check the direction of the boat, when i looked back (within a feuw seconds) the object had vanished.
Summary: Fat cigar shape, the white color similar to that of the white anamal on a washing machine
